title: Three-Lens Evaluation Model
description: An interactive Venn diagram showing how Technical, Pedagogical, and UX evaluation dimensions interact to form a complete MicroSim quality assessment framework.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Instructional Design
Quality Assurance
Evaluation
learningObjectives: Understand how technical, pedagogical, and UX evaluation dimensions interact
Identify the key criteria within each evaluation lens
Recognize how deficiencies in one area impact overall quality
Apply the three-lens framework to evaluate MicroSim quality

controls.description: Hover over circles to see evaluation criteria for each lens
Click on a circle to see detailed checklist for that dimension
Hover over intersections to see overlapping concerns

interactivity: Medium - hover and click interactions with information panels
